description: This file defines a React component for a Todo application, including component logic, state management, and rendering. It imports models, constants, and subcomponents, and initializes the app rendering.

classes.name: TodoApp
classes.description: Main React component managing the Todo list, including filtering, editing, and rendering of todos.

methods.name: componentDidMount
methods.description: Sets up routing for different todo views.

methods.name: handleNewTodoKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key press event to add new todo.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggles all todos as completed or active.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completion state of a specific todo.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Sets a todo into editing mode.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves changes to a todo and exits editing mode.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the Todo component with filtered todos and footer.
